s.text: The result, as the Justice Department would have predicted, is a robustly competitive magazine market in which Time and Newsweek actually, in some ways, surpass Slate . Circulation, revenue, ad pages, and profitability are a few of the dimensions in which, quite frankly, we are somewhat behind, although we lead in other important measures such as number of readers with Slate -logo umbrellas.
Salon , for example, is already full of baloney.
Like a regular Slate subscription, a one-year gift subscription also entitles the subscriber to an attractive Slate -logo umbrella.
